What are the requirements for launching a currency on the Verus network?

To launch a currency on the Verus network, it must be funded with at least 10 VRSCTEST, and have 1000 VRSCTEST preconverted at a specific rate (e.g., 0.01 VRSCTEST per GOLD) before the launch can occur. This process is part of the mining process, and mining the blocks that launch a currency earns conversion fees.

urrency must be funded with at least 10 VRSCTEST before sending the transaction returned from this command to
initiate a currency launch that will start at 50 blocks from when it was made (default), and that must have 1000 VRSCTEST preconverted at 0.01 VRSCTEST per GOLD in order to launch.
all of this happens as part of the mining process, since mining the blocks that launch a currency earn the 0.025% conversion fees of participation
in the launch, converting VRSCTEST to GOLD. I could send the following command before the block where GOLD token launches.
After it launches, the only way at present to create new tokens is with a centralized issuance option. To convert VRSCTEST to GOLD, you could issue the command:
 ```
./verus -chain=VRSCTEST sendcurrency "*" '[{"address":"mike@","convertto":"gold","preconvert":1,"amount":100}]'
```
that would effectively park my conversion until the token launches, at which point, I will either find 0.975 GOLD in my wallet, or I will have my VRSCTEST back.
Assuming it launches, and I later want to create mycoin, which can be converted to with either GOLD or VRSCTEST, I can create mycoin with:
./raw_text_input_wiki/release_notes.md
How can I convert VRSCTEST to a new token, like GOLD, before the token launches?

You can use the `sendcurrency` command to park your conversion until the token launches. Here's an example command:
```
./verus -chain=VRSCTEST sendcurrency "*" '[{"address":"mike@","convertto":"gold","preconvert":1,"amount":100}]'
```
This will effectively park your conversion until the GOLD token launches. After the launch, you will either find the converted amount of GOLD in your wallet, or you will have your original VRSCTEST amount returned.

What happens to my funds if the currency launch is successful?

If the currency launch is successful, you will receive the converted amount of the new token (e.g., GOLD) in your wallet. In the example above, you would receive 0.975 GOLD for every 100 VRSCTEST converted.

How can I create a new token that can be converted to with either GOLD or VRSCTEST?

To create a new token that can be converted to with either GOLD or VRSCTEST, you can define the token's properties using the `definecurrency` command. This will allow you to create a new token that can be converted to with either GOLD or VRSCTEST.
